model.text:
Customer Satisfaction Survey

Please help us to improve our service. Rate your satisfaction level with each of the following statements. It takes less than five minutes.

model.questions:
How satisfied are you with with the delivery of our products?
How do you rate the response time of our Sales Representatives?
How satisfied are you with the quality of our products?
How do you rate our customer communications?
Rate your overall satisfaction with the customer service.
model.answers:
Very dissatisfied
Somewhat dissatisfied
Neutral
Somewhat satisfied
Very satisfied

model.text: Based on your experience, what is the likelihood that you will...

model.questions:
Recommend our company to your friends?
Use our product/service again?
model.answers:
Not at all likely
Not very likely
Somewhat likely
Likely
Highly likely

model.cHint: What do you think? Any additional comments or concerns:
